album.title: The Best Of Peter Green's Fleetwood Mac

track.name: Need Your Love so Bad
comments: Such a fine song. Love these guys.
hot damn. Always love this song.
my 1st listen to this tune, even though PG and DK and JS were my favorite FM guitarists. .   very very nice.
It's really cool. Such a romantic song.
reminds me of when i woz in luv
Just as Wonderful as the Music are the Shouts below
Great song and nice rendition. Gary Moore does it for me. ♥
Peter Green = one of Britain's greatest blues musicians [2]

Love it. Peter Green didn't play too many notes, but the ones he did play were the ones that matter, what a feel there is in his playing. As far as I am concerned anything post-PG just isn't really FM

My first taste of Peter Green was this song.................and he is Fleetwood Mac, without Peter there is no FM...........those crettins that continue churning out bile in the name of FM will burn in the hell reserved for all pish pop artists
